spec_data.Name: perl-Pod-Markdown-Github
spec_data.Description:
Github flavored markdown allows for syntax highlighting using three
backticks. This Perl module inherits from Pod::Markdown and adds those
backticks and an optional language identifier.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:15:37 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Convert POD to Github's specific markdown
